name: SplashBack
description:
My Very first game and my first time attempting pixel art.

-Made for the Weekly Game Jam 143

-----

Fires are erupting through out the house, possibly due to a power surge.

You do not have a bucket or hose about so it's up to you to put out the fires with the only running water available

- find the fires through out the house (there's only one at a time) and put it out before it causes too much damage to the house.

how many fires can you put out?

CONTROLS

Space to put out fires

if you run out of liquid, Press UP to drink at sinks

up and down on doors to use

music

https://opengameart.org/content/fast-level-loop-8-bit-chiptune

https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-chiptune-run-under-fire
